  • Constructor Details

    • Client

      public Client​(int ID, int arrivalTime, int serviceTime)
      Constructor which initializes the fields of the Client class
      Parameters:
      ID - - an integer representing the identification value for each client
      arrivalTime - - an integer representing the second (moment in the simulation) the client is supposed to arrive at the store
      serviceTime - - an integer representing the amount of time required to serve the client when it gets to the server

      public Client()
      empty constructor used for initialization

    • compare

      public int compare​(Client client1, Client client2)
      method used to compare the clients based on their arrival time in order to sort them in the list
      Specified by:
      compare in interface java.util.Comparator<Client>
      Parameters:
      client1 - - the first client to compare
      client2 - - the second client to compare
      Returns:
      an integer representing the difference between their arrival time

    • updateWaitingTime

      public void updateWaitingTime()
      method used to update the waiting time of a client waiting time = the time a client spends waiting in the line (not being served, but being already in a queue)
